name: api-tester
description: A full-stack API testing tool for OpenAI-compatible APIs, MCP, A2A, and ACP protocols with a built-in CORS proxy server

scripts.typecheck: npm run --prefix packages/frontend typecheck && npm run --prefix packages/acp-runtime typecheck && npm run --prefix packages/server-remote-acp typecheck && npm run --prefix packages/server-main typecheck
scripts.build:server: npm run --prefix packages/acp-runtime build && npm run --prefix packages/server-remote-acp build && npm run --prefix packages/server-main build
scripts.server:remote-run: npm run --prefix packages/acp-runtime build && npm run --prefix packages/server-remote-acp build && node packages/server-remote-acp/dist/remote-run.js
scripts.mcp:cli: npm run --prefix packages/server-main build && node packages/server-main/dist/mcp-cli.js --config mcp-stdio.json
